titles: The separation of the Church of Rome from the Church of England founded upon a selfish and unchristian interest. By a presbyter in the Diocess of Canterbury. Febr. 28. 1689/90. Imprimatur, Z. Isham, R.P.D. Henrico Episc. Lond Ã  sacris.
author: Grascome, Samuel, 1641-1708?
publisher: printed for Richard Northcott, at the Marriner and Anchor. Adjoyning to St. Peters Alley Cornhil, London,
notes: "A presbyter in the Diocess of Canterbury" = Samuel Grascome; "Epistle to the reader" signed: S.G.
With preliminary contents leaves and a final advertisment leaf.

Copy bound with another (defective) copy, having leaf E3 torn at the margin and a replacement leaf bound behind it; both copies show print fade; cop. 1 has the "Epistle to the reader" signed in MS.: "Samll. Grascombe".
Reproduction of the originals in St. David's University College Library, Lampeter, Wales.
